name: RPGump
description:
(DEV NOTE) I'm too lazy to re-build my game, so you'll have to download it for now.

Your prized Rocket Launcher has been stuck at the top of an obstacle course, now you're stuck with your Grandpa's Ol' Rocky'.


-Use your rocket to boost yourself (Rocket Jump)

-Your Jump recharges every 7 seconds to allow "midair jumps" (Flatulence)

This is an early access and I know there are bugs still, but feel free to leave it down below as I plan to add more launchers and more obstacles, and possibly enemies.
